dialogues.text: As far as the eye can see there are lines of rusting cars trucks, bumper to bumper like a giant junkyard rush hour.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken walks up the on-ramp, onto the freeway. He strid rows of junked cars. A few of them have people inside...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a Mercedes rusted to its frame, its driver an 80 in sunglasses, drinking from a bottle. A pickup truck ful illegal aliens packed in like sardines. Someone cooks fro barbecue grill. An RV. An old man sits in the opened door staring at Plissken as he passes. Two old ladies in house stare at him through the windows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLICK, CLICK! A sound behind Plissken. He spins, 9mm read

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Taslima, running to catch up with him.

dialogues.speaker: TASLIMA
dialogues.text: I changed my mind. I'm going with you, wherever you're going.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: (gestures to the cars) What the hell is this?

dialogues.speaker: TASLIMA
dialogues.text: The freeway.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: I know that. There are people in some of these cars.

dialogues.speaker: TASLIMA
dialogues.text: It's where they live. I guess after everything happened, they just needed to do what they'd always done before. During the daytime, they just pull down the shades on their windows and sleep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken continues walking. Taslima catches up...

dialogues.speaker: TASLIMA
dialogues.text: What are you gonna do in Venice?

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Find Cuervo Jones.

dialogues.speaker: TASLIMA
dialogues.text: No! Stay away, Snake. He's mucho muerte.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly a shot rings out. Taslima is struck and falls. P drops between the cars and crawls over to her.

dialogues.speaker: TASLIMA
dialogues.text: Run, Snake...They're coming.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Who?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She touches his hand and looks at him softly.

dialogues.speaker: TASLIMA
dialogues.text: I don't know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taslima dies. Plissken stares at her for a moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More shots ring out - landing very close to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From out of the heavy bushes along the freeway storm a do Mescalitos moving quickly - firing as they go. Behind the an ancient garbage truck mounted with a 50-caliber machin Atop the truck is Delgado. He wears a flame thrower on hi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Returns fire, rolls under a car and begins crawling. All him people jump out of their cars, begin firing back at t Mescalitos.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smashes through a rusting Volkswagen, heading straight to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reaches the edge of the freeway, dives for the bushes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roars past, firing into the vehicles on the freeway, the running, screaming...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Clawing his way through the undergrowth, Plissken bursts side street. Behind him come the Mescalitos on foot. Plis runs, firing back every step of the way...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, in the blowing mist in front of him, a car scre into view. It's a perfectly restored, 1966 Cadillac conve Candy-apple red. The stereo blasts "Last Night" by the Sa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And behind the wheel is Map To The Stars Eddie.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Hop in, Snake!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the garbage truck bursts through. Delgado is behind th gun, blasting away, burning up the street. Bullets are fl everywhere as Plissken runs to the Cadillac and dives int back seat. He's still not fully inside when Map To The St roars away in a blaze of rubber and smoke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Takes aim with his flame thrower... KAWHOOSH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shoots out from the nozzle like a flaming spear. It strea the street, just missing the tail of the Cadillac as it s around a corner...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Map To The Stars Eddie races along a dark street. Plisske into the front seat.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Hey, Snake - that was great. They almost burned your ass off!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Map To The Stars Eddie drives like Satan himself. Plisske almost thrown out as they spin around curves, up onto sid Delgado and the garbage truck can't keep up with them. Fi the Mescalitos are left far behind as Map To The Stars Ed down to a cruise of 70.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Too many people know where you're going, Snake. That's not good. Delgado and his men were back there waiting for you.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Delgado?

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones' right-hand man. One tough hombre. You don't understand, Snake. Cuervo Jones wants to unify the island. We're on the move, man. Big time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Cadillac smashes through an intersection, knocking tw junked cars out of the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken jams his 9mm into Map To The Stars Eddie's ear.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Stop the damn car.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: No way.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: I said pull over.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: All right. Anything for you, Snake. (beat) Although I was going to take you to Cuervo Jones' place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken lowers the gun.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Where is it?

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Right over there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He points. Plissken looks off, as Map To The Stars Eddie button on the steering wheel with his finger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A small panel in front of Plissken flips down, revealing inch machine gun barrel. Before he can do anything, four rip straight into his chest, blasting him into the seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grits his teeth and gasps. His gun drops. Blood runs from holes in his shirt. His face grows red as he fights for a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Map To The Stars Eddie pushes the button again and the pa closes up over the barrel.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Pretty neat, huh? This is Cuervo's car. He lets me use it sometimes. (looks at Plissken) Not to worry, Snake. You were just shot with a fun-gun. You feel it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken gulps for air.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Pure mesh, man. 100-proof artery choker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken slumps back, collapses in the seat.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Like Cuervo says, when the hit pulls you down to one inch from death, that is living, man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kicks in hard. Surreal colors float through the dark, dev streets of Venice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken fights desperately against the drug, but he can'

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: You should've talked to me first, Snake. I could've set this whole thing up. I'm actually Cuervo's agent, you know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Plissken sags, losing consciousness, Map To The Stars voice begins to fade...

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: And I'd love to represent you, too. We could make a bundle together. I know I could really help your career...I mean, you're a legend and all - but the last couple years, man, it's like you've fallen off the face of the earth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the world crashes to black!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like a giant, scorched daddy-long-legs, the architectural of the LA airport rises above the empty parking lot litte the skeletal remains of burned-out cars and airport shutt wrecks of old 747s lie twisted and bent across the tarmac

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Surrounded by Mescalitos with torches and guns, sits the Bradley Terminal defaced with graffiti, the sign now read

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Opens. Looks around fuzzily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is in Cuervo Jones lair. Huge. Torch-lit. Plissken lie center of the room, chained to a treadmill. He is surroun Mescalitos.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In one corner of the room is lots of high-tech equipment. Computers. A VR simulator. Most of the Mescalitos are gat around a big screen TV. They watch the 207th Annual Acade from Carefree, Arizona.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones strides toward Plissken. Map To The Stars Ed scurries along at his side.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Come on, Cuervo. I delivered him, didn't I? All I'm asking for is what you promised.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: We'll see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones stops in front of Plissken. Sees that he's a Holds out a glass filled with red liquid.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: Carrot juice? (no response) Laced with tequila, Snake. Good for you. No? (no response) Your health.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones downs the carrot juice. Plissken lifts his h grimaces. Sweat pours down his face. He gasps for air.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: You're coming out of it, Snake. It hurts real bad. (beat) That's good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He kneels down next to Plissken.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: Dying isn't good enough for you. You need pain. You'll never make it to where you want to go without a little pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stands, considers Plissken for a moment.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: Snake Plissken. American outlaw. So typical of American idealism. The old west, Snake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones tosses the glass to Map To The Stars Eddie. beginning to enjoy the moment, performing for Plissken.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: Man against the sky. The individual. Freedom. No wonder they hate you so much in America, Snake. You remind them of what they used to be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones walks to a door, opens it. Beyond is a huge filled with people - families, teenage runaways, the elde illegal aliens, orphans - people with nowhere to go. They being fed and cared for by Mescalitos.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: Here is the real L.A., Snake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken lifts his head to see.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: The poor. The old. The lost. People without hope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He crosses back to Plissken...

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: Do you know what they want? One word. Liberation. (beat) They want a chance to live - before it's all gone. They've been hated for too long
(smiles) Now it's their turn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gestures to his men, who move to Plissken and begin ca unlocking him from the treadmill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Still wobbly, Plissken crawls to his feet...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Utopia comes bounding up from the big screen TV. Still in her racy underwear, she gives Cuervo Jones a kiss. She carries the prototype with her.

dialogues.speaker: UTOPIA
dialogues.text: Cuervo! LaToya Jackson just won Best Actress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones reaches out to take the prototype from her. on to it.

dialogues.speaker: UTOPIA
dialogues.text: You said I could hold it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He yanks it out of her hands, more violently than she exp Recovering, she casts a contemptuous glance at Plissken.

dialogues.speaker: UTOPIA
dialogues.text: Who's that?

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: You never heard of Snake Plissken?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Utopia takes a couple steps closer, squints.

dialogues.speaker: UTOPIA
dialogues.text: He doesn't look like his picture. (frown) I bet he's fake.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: Now go get dressed. We have things to do.

dialogues.speaker: UTOPIA
dialogues.text: Are we going to eat soon? I'm starved.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones gives her a slap on the butt, which startles

dialogues.speaker: UTOPIA
dialogues.text: Ooww!

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: Go on now. Do as I say.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken watches as Utopia walks away, out of the termina

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: I'm going to show her what it means to be a woman - for the first time in her pathetic little life. (smiles) Given her love, Snake. Everybody needs love.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He moves slightly closer to Plissken - though not too clo

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: You want to hook up with us? Join the revolution? We're all getting out of here tomorrow night. (holds up the prototype) We're gonna rule the world. Come with us, Snake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken says nothing. His good eye glares.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: No? Too bad. Well, I told you we'd finish it later. So guess what? It's later.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He motions to his men, who grab Plissken and drag him awa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The baggage claim area is an industrial wasteland filled machinery and hanging cables and wires. A door opens and is hurled in. The door slams shut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken stands a moment, trying to get his balance, when steps out of the shadows. It is Delgado.

dialogues.speaker: DELGADO
dialogues.text: You're mine now, Snake. All mine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Delgado slowly moves towards Plissken, swinging two huge machetes around his head. Plissken steps back, glances at wrist watch. 4 hours and 20 minutes gone.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken looks up as Delgado flings a machete at him. He barely dives out of the way, rolls on the floor...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Delgado charges toward him, machete poised like a bayonet Plissken rips off an edge guard from the baggage carousel wings it at Delgado. The machete is blocked with a direct

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Delgado is thrown sideways. Plissken runs, launches himse through the air, twisting his body sideways, and lands a right in Delgado's face. Delgado goes sprawling. One of t machetes CLANKS to the floor...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken grabs the machete, just as Delgado rises...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHOOSH! Plissken's arm is a blur as he throws...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THUMP! The machete sticks out of Delgado's chest. He look it in horror, then crumbles to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The caravan is starting up again. Wearing hot pants, a ta and full-length mink coat, Utopia is escorted up a ladder Cuervo Jones to the opened door of the Cadillac perched u those monster truck wheels. The other Mescalitos mount up cars and motorcycles, and roar away from the terminal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Above, on top of the terminal, see a figure move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Plissken. He grabs an electrical wire and throws it side...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stands watching the caravan pull away. He doesn't see the dangling behind him, and Plissken shinnying down it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beat. Beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHACK! Plissken takes him out with one blow, lowers himse ground, takes his rifle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken quickly moves down the dark street after the car

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones' caravan comes rolling down Manchester, into parking lot toward the Forum. Portions of the gigantic sp arena have been damaged in the earthquake, but crowds sti into the entrances.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The caravan pulls up at the Forum Club entrance. Cuervo J Utopia, Map To The Stars Eddie and the others enter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Approaches, ducks behind an old junked car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken sneaks up to a crumbled, broken wall of the Foru inside through a large crack...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken's in the backstage area, near the locker rooms. cheering from the main arena. Slowly Plissken moves to a opens it, steps out...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cheering is louder is Plissken makes his way along th hallway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now the sound of gunfire from someplace up ahead. Plisske

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly from down the hallway come two Black Muslims car body on a stretcher. As they pass, Plissken notices the b wearing a bloody basketball uniform full of bullet holes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He moves forward...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken peers into the main arena. A basketball game is The Korean Dragons sit on one side, the Black Muslims on other. They cheer wildly for their respective teams. Pipe in the crowd, enjoying the game...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken moves closer, among the crowd along the baseline whole place is lit by torches and clumsily-wired lighting his head is the shot clock, slowly ticking down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's blood everywhere on the floor. The referees wear proof body suits and helmets. Trainers with stretchers st

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ticks down: 5 - 4...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dribbles the ball towards the basket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ticks down: 3 - 2...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A whole row of Korean Dragons with rifles stand and take

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pulls up into a jump shot, releases the ball into the air sails through the basket just as the horn goes off, beati 24-second violation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Black Muslim crowd cheers. The Korean Dragons sit dow Plissken watches...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moving through the seats on the Korean Dragon side of the Map To The Stars Eddie stands near the baseline, listenin game on his silver portable radio...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hands the ball to a Korean Dragon guard. The Korean Drago dribbles the ball down court, into the corner and passes The Korean Dragons can't get a shot off...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Above Plissken's head ticks down: 5 - 4 - 3 - 2 - 1... HO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guard still has the ball - the shot clock horn has gone o second violation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A whole row of Black Muslims with rifles stand up, take a fire!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Korean Dragon guard is riddled with bullets. He falls the floor. The Trainers with stretchers quickly collect h and hurry off the court.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ball boys quickly wipe up the blood with mops.

dialogues.speaker: ANNOUNCER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: (sound of effect of breaking glass) Shot clock!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Black Muslim crowd is cheering and screaming! "I Love begins playing on the loudspeaker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The players wear do-rags and black uniforms that look a w like the black leather that Plissken wears. One of the pl JAMAAL, notices Plissken.

dialogues.speaker: JAMAAL
dialogues.text: Hey - Snake Plissken, you knew my brother Abdul. He was with you in Cleveland.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The other players react, greet Plissken, slapping his han thumping chests, high-fiving each other.

dialogues.speaker: JAMAAL
dialogues.text: Welcome aboard, Snake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Plissken pays no attention. He sees:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sitting in the Korean Dragon section near the other end o court.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sit next to Xi-Ping, the leader of the Korean Dragons, a man with green and brown psychedelic camouflage on his fa Utopia watches the game while the two men confer. Cuervo a firm grip on the prototype.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: The time is now. We are the strongest. If we go together, the others will come. (beat) We go for everything, Xi-Ping. But we go together. What do you say?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Xi-Ping nodes. They clasp hands...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Realizes he's got to get to the other side of the court. into the huddle with Jamaal, peering at him with his one cold eye.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Your brother died owing me, so I'm taking it out in trade. I need a favor...

dialogues.speaker: JAMAAL
dialogues.text: Sure, Snake. Anything.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: I need to get across the court now... without drawing attention to myself.

dialogues.speaker: JAMAAL
dialogues.text: Like you ain't gonna stick out like a sore thumb. But we'll do what we can, Snake. Use the clock. Screen and roll. Now let's kick some butt!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The players knock fists. Plissken puts on a do-rag. Yelli move onto the court, creating a shield for Plissken.

dialogues.speaker: JAMAAL
dialogues.text: (whispers) You play much pick-up ball, Snake?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken's watching Cuervo Jones and Utopia at the other

dialogues.speaker: JAMAAL
dialogues.text: Whatever happens, watch the shot clock, man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The referee blows his whistle. A Black Muslim guard inbou ball. The game is underway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken ducks down the court using the rest of his team They go into a set play.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The game is a cross between basketball and kung-fu. Playe slashing fists, spin-kicks, elbows and hard back-hands. I combat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Korean Dragon guarding Plissken chops him. Plissken k flat. No foul.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Utopia sees Plissken, nudges Cuervo Jones.

dialogues.speaker: UTOPIA
dialogues.text: It's that weird guy again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones grabs her and heads for the exit...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken sees this, stops playing, moves after them... wh suddenly the basketball lands right in his hands!

dialogues.speaker: JAMAAL
dialogues.text: Snake! Shot clock!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ticks down: 4 - 3 - 2...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A whole row of Korean Dragons with rifles stand up, take Plissken. Cuervo Jones watches expectantly...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken spins, executes a beautiful-looking jump shot. T sounds just as it leaves his hand...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Swish. Nothing but net.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Korean Dragons sit back down, put away their rifles, disappointed. Cuervo Jones, Utopia, Xi-Ping and their hen quickly leave. The Black Muslims go crazy, and Plissken d toward one of the exits. He stops, sees...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With his portable radio, trying to get out of the arena, behind a crowd of Dragons. Plissken races through the cro Map To The Stars Eddie.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Hey, Snake, man... Great shot!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Without hesitation, Snake whacks him across the jaw. Map Stars Eddie goes down like a sack of laundry. Plissken gr by the collar, drags him off toward an exit...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones, Utopia, Xi-Ping and their men rush out to t caravan of waiting vehicles. Xi-Ping has his own armada o vehicles and an army of evil-looking guards. Cuervo Jones Xi-Ping aside.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: That man in black. He's very dangerous.

dialogues.speaker: XI-PING
dialogues.text: One eye?

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: Yes. We gotta dump him.

dialogues.speaker: XI-PING
dialogues.text: What does he want?

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: (glances at the prototype) I'm betting the cops sent him in. Man, I do not need this. I got a war to win.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Plissken drags Map To The Stars Eddie out into the nig crouches behind a row of cars, watches Cuervo Jones' cara their engines.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken shakes Map To The Stars Eddie, waking him...

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Where are they going?

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: (groggy) Oh, man... You didn't have to hit me, Snake. I can help you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken shoves the barrel of his pistol up against Map T Stars Eddie's temple.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Bankrupt City. The Happy Kingdom. (beat) Snake, Cuervo's hooked up with Xi-Ping. He is primetime, man - Mister Bad News. The rest of the city's joining up with 'em. (beat) You're shit outta luck, Snake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken reaches into a pocket, comes out with the large clip, slips it on his 9mm pistol.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Not yet.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: I could've helped you. We coulda made a deal with Cuervo. If you'd listen...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Without looking, Plissken slams his elbow into Map To The Eddie's jaw with a WHACK! He flops unconscious on the pav

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones' caravan led by that huge Cadillac on monste moves away from the Forum toward an exit. Plissken moves them, ducking behind the row of cars...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The caravan picks up speed as it approaches the exit...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken appears behind an old truck, just as the Cadilla past him. He crouches on the balls of his feet, and as th the Caddy drifts closer, he springs...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And grabs on to the rear bumper. The monster wheels spin huge, black scythes on either side of him. Plissken reach the Caddy, finds a purchase on the undercarriage, and swi the Cadillac. He hangs dangling above the street by one h the caravan pulls out onto Manchester. With the other he his 9mm and aims it at the undercarriage, right about whe front seat should be...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The front seat explodes, bullets screaming upward through leather seats, tearing and shredding fabric and flesh, ki driver and Xi-Ping instantly!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the back seat sit Cuervo Jones and Utopia. The Caddy b swerve, the wheel spinning. Cuervo Jones lunges forward a seat and grabs it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Under the Cadillac, Plissken continues to fire: BLAM, BLA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The front seat disintegrates. Metal, leather, padding fly everywhere. Cuervo Jones ducks against the door, covering with one hand, still grasping the wheel with the other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The entire front seat and floor underneath it fall down o Cadillac and hit the street below. The bodies of the driv Ping flop under the monster wheels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken swings over to the hole and pulls himself up int opening that used to be the front seat. Cuervo Jones star in total shock, but before he can speak...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken rips the prototype out of his hands! Then jumps back seat next to Utopia. Then grabs her and turns to the door. Cuervo Jones releases the wheel for a moment, turns Plissken...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Plissken opens the side door, kicks it wide, and with under his arm, slides across the seat...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... and sails out of the Cadillac...

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken and Utopia fly through the air, and land with a top of a Mescalito car as the Cadillac begins to swerve w Cuervo Jones grabs the wheel, desperately tries to contro Caddy... but fails. The Cadillac careens off the street, into the palm tree, spins around and crashes into the rem hot dog stand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken and Utopia roll and tumble. He still has a hold and she fights him tooth and nail...

dialogues.speaker: UTOPIA
dialogues.text: Lemme go...!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The driver swerves, hits the brakes... and the car hops t slides along the sidewalk, burning rubber.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are thrown forward. They tumble off the roof... across th and land on the sidewalk in front of the car. They roll t as the car screeches to a stop, inches from their heads, caravan suddenly puts on its brakes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Screaming tires. Cars jackknifing, spinning in a massive collision...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones emerges from the remains of the Cadillac.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken drags Utopia into the street, grabs the lid of a in the street, pries it up...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mescalitos pour out of their vehicles, as Cuervo Jones ch into the street, pointing at Plissken...

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: Kill him, kill him...!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken lifts Utopia to her feel, hauls her over to the opening, and dives inside... just as the Mescalitos open street around the manhole opening explodes with screaming lead...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken and Utopia land in the half-filled storm drain. to his feet, pulls her with him, and heads off sloshing t the water. The sound of gunfire echoes above them...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones and the Mescalitos charge the open manhole a The Stars Eddie appears groggily shuffling up the street Forum...

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: (grins to himself) Good thinkin', Snake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He heads off down the street...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken and Utopia race along through the water. He lite to drag her with him. They turn a corner, go down another drain away from the main tunnel...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The black belly of the sewer system. Plissken and Utopia along, slow as they come to...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One side of the passage, the same one we saw earlier on o journey with Pendejo Bob.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken spins Utopia around, pushes her backward toward off, his eye burning into her...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her feet reach the very edge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken holds her there. Utopia's face is a mask of shee She gulps air in staccato bursts...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beat. Beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken can't do it. He can't push her off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He releases her, backs up, looks at the prototype, then p of his revolvers from its holster, cocks the hammer, aims

dialogues.speaker: UTOPIA
dialogues.text: My... father sent you... didn't he? (beat) He sent you to kill me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken raises the pistol. She's dead in his sights.

dialogues.speaker: UTOPIA
dialogues.text: Didn't he? (begins to cry)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Plissken can't. He can't kill her. The toughest man o Earth can't kill this 17-year-old runaway.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken sags, clicks the hammer back, holsters the gun. at her.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Get out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Utopia wipes her eyes, confused, afraid.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: I said go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slowly Utopia moves from the edge of the drop off, starts down the tunnel, then stops, looks back at Plissken. She the prototype in Plissken's hand...

dialogues.speaker: UTOPIA
dialogues.text: Don't take it back. Don't give it to him. Please. Let me have it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken glances at the prototype, then at her.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: What does this thing do?

dialogues.speaker: UTOPIA
dialogues.text: (her eyes grow wide) No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken's shoulder explodes as a bullet tears through hi He spins, drops the prototype...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... as Map To The Stars Eddie emerges from the darkness o sewer tunnel. He holds a gun in one hand, aims...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He fires again, hits Plissken's leg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken staggers backward toward the edge of the drop of To The Stars Eddie moves quickly forward...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... and snatches the prototype from the wet floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken's gun hand is useless, numb from the shoulder wo slowly, painfully transfers the pistol to the other hand, raise it...

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: So long, Snake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Map To The Stars Eddie takes aim - a head shot ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken spins, and dives off the edge...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... down into the drop off...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Airborne. Falling through black space. Down, down, down, to hell below, until we can't see him anymore as the dark swallows him up...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Map To The Stars Eddie steps to the ledge, looks down, as Jones and his Mescalitos slog up through the tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: Where is he?

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: He jumped. Down there. (beat) He's dead, Cuervo. I did it. I killed Plissken.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones looks over the edge, at the silent blackness Then he turns to Map To The Stars Eddie.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: Give it to me.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: You said I could be Vice-President, Cuervo. Your right-hand man.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: (extends his hand) Give it.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Sure, Cuervo, but look here. I've done it all, man. I killed Plissken, I got your girl back, I got it all. Just for you, Cuervo. Just for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dead silence. Cuervo Jones stands with his hand extended. Map To The Stars Eddie gives up, starts to hand Cuervo th prototype...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... but slips on the wet floor...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... and drops the prototype with a CLANK!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A red light comes on, blinks urgently.

dialogues.speaker: PROTOTYPE VOICE
dialogues.text: (tiny, filtered) I am now armed and ready for use. Use extreme caution. The location of the effected blast area can only be determined by the orbital position of the SatStar Ring.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone in the tunnel is frozen, unable to move. Slowly Jones picks up the prototype, stares at it, then breaks i smile...

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: This is turning out to be my lucky day. (stares coldly at Map To The Stars Eddie) Get this asshole outta here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Several Mescalitos grab Map To The Stars Eddie, pull him along the tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Cuervo, wait. Please...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones turns to Utopia, who stands numbly staring o drop-off. He walks over to her, then slaps her hard, vici across the face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Utopia reacts to the stinging slap.

dialogues.speaker: UTOPIA
dialogues.text: Cuervo...?

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: You're my woman, you understand? You don't let anybody take you away from me without a fight.

dialogues.speaker: UTOPIA
dialogues.text: I tried...

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: (in her face) Nobody leaves Cuervo Jones. Not unless you give your life. You fight till you're dead. Then I forgive you. (screams) Understand? (shakes her) Understand?

dialogues.speaker: UTOPIA
dialogues.text: Yes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shoves her down the tunnel...

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: Let's go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The others follow them...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Cuervo Jones and Utopia emerge from the manhole cover, sound of hundreds of helicopters rise.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: (looks up) Look, baby. They're all mine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Above Manchester and the Forum is filled with helicopters models, all makes, mostly the older, discarded military B Phoenix 14-bladed attack choppers that scream through the blackness like scythe-slashing robot bugs. They are on th southeast, toward Orange County.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looking out at L.A. from above Mount Lee, see the Hollywo and wave after wave of helicopters thundering across the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're like buck teeth, sheered off and crumbling, stuck the sky. Chopper roar overhead. A group of vagrants clust a camp fire on the top floor of one of the towers. They'r watching a futuristic big-spin lotto on a large screen TV sound of the choppers brings them to the edge of the buil the walls of the floors beneath have been torn away. Desk furniture, rugs, everything hangs out over the empty spac

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pandemonium. Troops, vehicles, helicopters, everything is urgent motion. A loudspeaker voice blares:

dialogues.speaker: POLICE VOICE, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Full stage battle alert. All personnel to battle stations.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Malloy, the President and Brazen charge down a hallway in Command HQ. The place is jumping. Full scramble alert.

dialogues.speaker: MALLOY
dialogues.text: A sky full of enemy choppers on radar. Moving over the city to the southeast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A COM Officer rushes up to Malloy...

dialogues.speaker: COM OFFICER
dialogues.text: Commander - massive vehicle and troop movement on the ground. All major streets leading to the southeast.

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: What're they doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Malloy looks at the President grimly.

dialogues.speaker: MALLOY
dialogues.text: Getting ready to invade.

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: (beat) So where's Plissken?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Creaking. The WHOOSH of something swinging through the ai

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A huge blue eye opens. Looks around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken's boot is hooked in a twisted wire mesh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then Plissken swings like a pendulum, hanging from a strand of wire mesh attached somewhere above in the black

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken's eye blinks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Begins to reveal details: slimy walls. Below, a black pit Wind gushing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then a light stabs across the void...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... The light hits Plissken's good eye...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The light is from inside the eye of Pendejo Bob. He stand small ledge, at the mouth of a cave leading into the howl

dialogues.speaker: PENDEJO BOB
dialogues.text: Hey, Snake. You okay? (unhooks the lariat) I heard gunfire down here... (begins to swing the rope) Never been down this far before... (swings the rope in a huge arc) Grab this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pendejo Bob tosses the lariat. The noose flies across the Plissken grabs it with his good hand.

dialogues.speaker: PENDEJO BOB
dialogues.text: Now hang on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken wraps his good hand and arm in the noose, as Pen jerks the line hard. Plissken is in mid-swing, and the ro jerking pulls him abruptly in the opposite direction...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken's boot slips out of the wire mesh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Plissken falls like a brick, stops abruptly as the li catches, and swings against the side of the pit. He dangl only his one good arm holding on to the rope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pendejo Bob pulls the line upward, straining against Plis weight. Slowly Plissken rises, a tug at a time, hauled up of the pit toward the cave above...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... when suddenly he passes another opening, a storm drai Pendejo Bob. He swings into the drain, grasps the side wi hand, and pulls himself in...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pendejo Bob stares down at his rope disappearing into the the pit.

dialogues.speaker: PENDEJO BOB
dialogues.text: Hey, Snake...where are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken crawls into the slimy drain, pulls the rope off Ahead in the darkness is the rushing of water. He turns o legs, back toward the pit behind him. Bleeding. Numb in o His leg on fire.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: (yells) I'm in another opening... Storm drain... There may be another way up to you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken crawls along the drain. The sound of rushing wat louder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He comes to the edge of the drain. Right below him is ano drain filled with water rushing through it like a river.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken is stuck. He turns, in great pain, and starts ba the pit... when suddenly everything starts shaking. Boomi a small earthquake, a pre-shock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly the concrete bottom on which he stands gives way disintegrates...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Plissken falls backward into the rushing water, and i suddenly downstream into the drain, disappearing from sig

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stands silently above, listening...

dialogues.speaker: PENDEJO BOB
dialogues.text: Snake... (no reply) Snake!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Booming. The whole pit shudders, shaking. Another earthqu Pendejo Bob drops the rope, turns and dashes away down th vibrating storm drain...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Black oil-slicked water rushes in the moonlight, out of a opening in what appears to be a canyon wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As an arm shoots out, clutching the edges of the drain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emerges from the hole, slides out, tumbles down to a wate canyon bottom. He lies there for a moment, trying to focu eye. Stabbing pain in his shoulder and leg. Finally he ri unsteadily to his feet, looks around, trying to get his b He finds himself at the bottom of...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Straight down Wilshire Boulevard is an enormous canyon, a bottom gouged out of concrete in the big earthquake. At l feet deep, it is a vast trough leading past skyscrapers a buildings above, off into the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken warily glances at his watch: 1 hour 10 minutes t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly Plissken is struck by a pair of headlights. Pipe dune buggy comes bumping along the canyon bottom, sloshin water, pulling up next to Plissken.

dialogues.speaker: PIPELINE
dialogues.text: Snake. Saw you at the game tonight. Great shot. (stares at him) You look like shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken hobbles over to the dune buggy as Pipeline gets

dialogues.speaker: PIPELINE
dialogues.text: You feel those pre-shocks, Snake?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pipeline unties the various surfboards he has lashed to t of the buggy. He lifts one down and slings it under his a

dialogues.speaker: PIPELINE
dialogues.text: Could be a big one comin' any minute now...

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Where's... Cuervo Jones...?

dialogues.speaker: PIPELINE
dialogues.text: Long gone. You'll never catch up with him now, Snake.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Where?

dialogues.speaker: PIPELINE
dialogues.text: Anaheim. Headquarters for everything. The whole town's gonna be there. Things changin' fast around here, Snake. It's not the same as the old days, man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A thumping sound skyward. More choppers thunder over them their way southeast. Plissken grabs Pipeline with his goo

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Take me there...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But he's too weak. His hand slides off. Plissken sinks to knees. Pipeline stares at him.

dialogues.speaker: PIPELINE
dialogues.text: You ain't doin' so good, Snake. You need help. (bends down, helps Plissken to his feet) You should talk to Hershe. She hates Cuervo. They used to be partners, but they split up.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Who?

dialogues.speaker: PIPELINE
dialogues.text: Hershe. She lives downtown with Mojo Dellasandro in the big boat. Down that way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pipeline points down the canyon to the east.

dialogues.speaker: PIPELINE
dialogues.text: She's connected with the Black Cowboys, and they don't take shit from nobody...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly that booming, shuddering rumble begins. The cany to shake. The water in the canyon floor sloshes wildly.

dialogues.speaker: PIPELINE
dialogues.text: Yo', man. It's a big one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the earthquake hits like a roaring sledgehammer. The the canyon crack. Plissken and Pipeline are thrown to the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Skyscrapers above them on Wilshire rock and tremble in th Pieces of the building sheer off, fall. A parking garage

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thunder shakes the earth around Plissken and Pipeline. Th floor splits open. Water pours into the cracks. Huge boul chunks of concrete tumble down the canyon walls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then suddenly it all stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The booming subsides. The earth stops shaking. Plissken a Pipeline get to their feet, look around. The water around continues to slosh about violently.

dialogues.speaker: PIPELINE
dialogues.text: Tsunami, Snake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His eyes wide, a smile on his face, Pipeline hurries over dune buggy, grabs another surfboard from the back, hands Plissken.

dialogues.speaker: PIPELINE
dialogues.text: Surf's up big time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now there is another deep sound rising, coming from the w behind them: A bass roar that slowly climbs from the very of the register upward, as if some massive wall of doom w its way...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pipeline kneels, positions his surfboard in his hands.

dialogues.speaker: PIPELINE
dialogues.text: Get ready, Snake. It's gonna be some kinda ride.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken looks behind him...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is blasting down the Wilshire Canyon, coming right for th a 25-foot wall of ocean water, moving fast, bellowing lik thunderclap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken sees he can't climb out of the canyon in time, m to Pipeline, kneels down...

dialogues.speaker: PIPELINE
dialogues.text: Let the front edge pick you up. Don't get on your board till it peaks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind them, the tsunami slams along the canyon, coming r them.

dialogues.speaker: PIPELINE
dialogues.text: Don't lose it, man. You slip off your board and it's the Big Wipeout, you know what I mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The roaring is so loud it's like being on the inside of a barrel. The tsunami is 100 feet away... 75 feet... 50 fee feet... It rolls up right behind them...

dialogues.speaker: PIPELINE
dialogues.text: Hang on, Snake! (yells)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of the tsunami sweeps under them. Pipeline and Plissken p from the canyon floor just as the water shovels them upwa cow catcher on a train. The water sweeps them up until th disappear under the blackness...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Until suddenly Pipeline pops up on top of the tsunami, ri his surfboard, arms outstretched, feet braced.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then Plissken pops up beside him, surfing clumsily on the tsunami wave, kneeling on his surfboard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They blast down Wilshire Canyon at 80 miles an hour. Plis wobbly on the surfboard, but he manages to stay on top of wave. Finally, he gets the hang of it, glances over at Pi who grins from ear to ear.

dialogues.speaker: PIPELINE
dialogues.text: Awesome, Snake. AWESOME, man!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken looks up ahead...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Five feet from street level. An old van speeds along what of Wilshire Boulevard, right on the canyon's edge. It vee debris in the street, changes lanes suddenly, hell bent f leather.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken and Pipeline move closer and closer to the van a tsunami sweeps them along.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now they move alongside the van and Plissken stares over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind the wheel is Map To The Stars Eddie, driving like lunatic, his teeth bared and set, madder than shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken's eye widens, burns.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: (to Pipeline) See you later.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And suddenly Plissken shifts his weight, and the surfboar and slides sideways, across the surface of the tsunami al over to the edge, right next to the van. Map To The Stars glances to his left...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is surfing the tsunami not 10 feet away from him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Map To The Stars Eddie stares in absolute horror. Plisske the board again, and slides another 5 feet closer...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jams the pedal, and the van screams forward...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stands up and leaps from the surfboard...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For a moment he is airborne, leaping across the gap to th and slams into the side of the van. He grabs on to the ro on with one hand, his body whipping against the rocking, side. Map To The Stars Eddie starts swerving, trying to t Plissken off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The van shoots back and forth across Wilshire, Plissken d inches from the tsunami-filled canyon. Plissken pulls him and crawls onto the roof...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Map To The Stars Eddie pulls his gun, cocks it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When suddenly Plissken's hand snakes down from the roof, in the driver's window, grabs his hair, and slams his for into the steering wheel with a THOCK!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Map To The Stars Eddie goes out like a light. He slumps o the seat... but his foot is stuck on the accelerator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken grabs the wheel with his left hand, and manages the van from the roof. The van lurches wildly, hits a chu concrete in the street, skids, fishtailing violently from impact. It smashes against the curb, screeches and bumps concrete.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Map To The Stars Eddie's foot is bumped right off the acc and the van slows to a wobbling, grinding stop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken slowly climbs down from the roof, opens the driv door, shoves Map To The Stars Eddie out of the way, and j

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken pulls out into the street and speeds off down Wi Map To The Stars Eddie starts to come around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken grabs his gun, cocks it, puts the barrel up agai To The Stars Eddie's temple just as he comes to.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Listen up. I need directions. Downtown. Somebody named Hershe.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Sure, Snake. No problem. (groggy) You gonna kill me?

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Later.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: I couldn't help it, Snake. I had to shoot you. Cuervo made me do it, I swear to God, man.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Cease fire with the bullshit.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Right. Keep goin' straight. Two blocks down, turn right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones' image fills the screen. He addresses the ca holds the prototype in his hands.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: Abandon your firebases by 0500 hours. Have the news media standing by for my coronation. I'm arriving in style.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PULL BACK from the TV screen to reveal we are in...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Malloy, the President, Brazen, and the other Controllers Police Personnel stare silently at their TV screens.

dialogues.speaker: BRAZEN
dialogues.text: He must be bouncing the signal from one of our communications satellites.

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: That means CableNet has already picked it up. This thing's going live all over the country.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: (on the TV) It's a brand new day comin' up this morning, and I'm just so proud to be leading the parade. See you soon, putos.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SSSZZZ. The image blinks off into static.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A grim silence.

dialogues.speaker: MALLOY
dialogues.text: The prototype appears to be armed, Mr. President. (the President nods grimly) Shall I begin evacuation?

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: Does he know how to activate it?

dialogues.speaker: MALLOY
dialogues.text: Well, yeah. All you have to do is push the button.

dialogues.speaker: BRAZEN
dialogues.text: What about Plissken? He could still be -

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: Forget him. He's dead.

dialogues.speaker: MALLOY
dialogues.text: That may not be true, Mr. President. (beat) He's one tough case. Plissken's been dead so many times I can't count. But he never stays down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A long beat.

dialogues.speaker: MALLOY
dialogues.text: There are two choices, Mr. President. Wait for Plissken, or surrender. It's your decision.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The President sighs heavily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jammed next to the remains of the Bonaventure Hotel is th Mary, permanently dry-docked between the broken skyscrape Big One.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The van stops next to a huge hole in the side of the ship

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The glow of Map To The Stars Eddie's flashlight takes him Plissken deeper and deeper into the hulking remains of th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They walk through a dimly lighted area lined with shops. glass display windows are covered with layers of impenetr dirt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They enter a long, narrow corridor. At the end is a doorw is light in the room beyond.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken and Map To The Stars Eddie enter a long room lit jets on the walls. In it is a crumbling, Victorian swimmi A heavy mist rises from the pool's surface and hangs over everything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the far end is a group of people. Spinal and the Black Gang. Boots, spurs, dusters, and guns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mojo Dellasandro. Jamaican Voodoo witch doctor. A brutal, face. And a beautiful woman in a bathing suit, her back f

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken and Map To The Stars Eddie approach.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Hey, Hershe. How're you doin'?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The woman turns and faces them. This is HERSHE, an absolu drop-dead, gorgeous transvestite who looks completely con as a woman but talks in Isaac Hayes' voice.

dialogues.speaker: SPINAL
dialogues.text: (eyes brightening) Hershe - it's Snake Plissken.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Yeah, Hershe. I brought him to see you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken walks right up to Hershe, has no reaction at all transvestite.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: I need a favor.

dialogues.speaker: HERSHE
dialogues.text: What's in it for me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken stares, a glimmer of recognition on his face.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Wait a minute. I know that voice. (beat) You're Carjack Malone.

dialogues.speaker: HERSHE
dialogues.text: Not anymore.

dialogues.speaker: SPINAL
dialogues.text: You two know each other?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken is seething. Hershe remains calm, glacial.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: You owe me. You left me holdin' everything back there in Cleveland.

dialogues.speaker: SPINAL
dialogues.text: (astounded) Hershe, you were in Cleveland?

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Yeah. With me and Texas Mike O'Shay.

dialogues.speaker: HERSHE
dialogues.text: I was called away on urgent business, Snake.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Don't lie to me.

dialogues.speaker: HERSHE
dialogues.text: All right, so I made another deal.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: I got a new deal for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken raises Map To The Stars Eddie's gun, aims it rig between Hershe's eyes.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: You help me, you live.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The others tense, hands on guns.

dialogues.speaker: SPINAL
dialogues.text: I wouldn't be doin' that, Snake.

dialogues.speaker: HERSHE
dialogues.text: We have a little arrangement. Anything happens to me, you're dead.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: I'm already dead.

dialogues.speaker: HERSHE
dialogues.text: (long beat) I see your point. What's the favor?

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: (looks at his watch) Get me to Cuervo Jones. Get me to the Kingdom. I got one hour.

dialogues.speaker: HERSHE
dialogues.text: Dream on, blue eye.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Say goodnight, Carjack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken cocks his gun, starts to squeeze the trigger...

dialogues.speaker: HERSHE
dialogues.text: Wait a minute. All right. Hold on.

dialogues.speaker: SPINAL
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones has more firepower than two armies. No one gets near him.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: And he's got the prototype. And the girl. He holds all the cards.

dialogues.speaker: HERSHE
dialogues.text: Exactly what is this prototype? What does it do?

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: You push the button, it sends a signal to a ring of space defense satellites. They're orbiting bombs. Nukes. They explode. Huge space burst. (beat) EMP. Electromagnetic Pulse. It happens instantly when a nuke is airburst. EMP shuts down every power source below the satellites - instantly. All electrical devices, computers, cars, airplanes, cities. It's the dark ages again.

dialogues.speaker: HERSHE
dialogues.text: So whoever has it runs the show.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: They were gonna use it on South America, Africa, Asia - any country hostile to the United States.

dialogues.speaker: SPINAL
dialogues.text: Only Cuervo's got it now.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: And that ring of satellites will be in position over the U.S. at 5:00 a.m. this morning.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: How do you know all this?

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: I used to represent the guy who invented it. I swear to God, Snake. No bullshit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A long silence.

dialogues.speaker: HERSHE
dialogues.text: So what's the deal, gorgeous?

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: We get the girl and the prototype. And we get out.

dialogues.speaker: SPINAL
dialogues.text: All of us?

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Me too?

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: (stares at him hard) We'll see.

dialogues.speaker: HERSHE
dialogues.text: Why should we leave? I love L.A. Where we gonna go? What's the payoff?

dialogues.speaker: SPINAL
dialogues.text: I'd like to get out but I don't have enough money.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: The President's promised to give whoever helps me 1 million dollars.

dialogues.speaker: SPINAL
dialogues.text: Yeah? Greenbacks? I got ten million of them.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Uh-uh. Bluebacks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This gets everyone's attention.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Aw, come on, Snake.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Bluebacks. I'm not bullshittin'. I swear to God.

dialogues.speaker: HERSHE
dialogues.text: I don't know, sounds thin to me.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: You want to stay here, while Cuervo Jones rules the world?

dialogues.speaker: HERSHE
dialogues.text: (grim) No, that sucks. (beat) How are we getting out?

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: I don't know yet.

dialogues.speaker: SPINAL
dialogues.text: Shit.

dialogues.speaker: HERSHE
dialogues.text: You always were a loser, Plissken. Makin' things up as you go along. That's why I cut out on you in Cleveland. You're just a bum like the rest of us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smoke has begun to drift into the pool area.

dialogues.speaker: MOJO DELLASANDRO
dialogues.text: (a soft voice) Use the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look at him.

dialogues.speaker: MOJO DELLASANDRO
dialogues.text: They're burning. Santa Anas. The night wind.

dialogues.speaker: SPINAL
dialogues.text: What're you talking about, Mojo?

dialogues.speaker: MOJO DELLASANDRO
dialogues.text: Death from above...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken, Hershe, Map To The Stars Eddie, Spinal and the Cowboy Gang stand on the top deck of the Queen Mary. Mojo Dellasandro straps each man into his own hang glider rig. whips around them. The hillsides in the distance are on f

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look like strange oversized moths lined up on the ed deck. The wind picks up Map To The Stars Eddie's rig. He and down, side to side, buffeted wildly until Mojo Dellas brings him back down to the decking.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: I don't know about this thing.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Don't like it, don't come.

dialogues.speaker: SPINAL
dialogues.text: Where'd you get these rigs, Carjack?

dialogues.speaker: HERSHE
dialogues.text: My name is Hershe Hernandez, do you understand, cowboy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Mojo Dellasandro passes out various weapons to the men The Stars Eddie leans over to Plissken, their hang glider thumping clumsily into each other. Eddie holds up that sm metal-plated portable radio he was carrying when we first

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: I got an idea, Snake. (shows Plissken the radio) This looks like the prototype, right?

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Yeah, kinda.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: So maybe we can pull off a Texas switch on Cuervo.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: If he lets you get close enough.

dialogues.speaker: HERSHE
dialogues.text: The wind's up. Let's go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The men brace themselves. Map To The Stars Eddie looks li wants to die.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hershe looks over at Plissken and grins.

dialogues.speaker: HERSHE
dialogues.text: See you in hell, Snake.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: If I'm late, Carjack, don't start without me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With that Plissken launches himself off the deck, sailing open space, then down toward the street...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gliding through the air, as the wind picks him upward. He away from the street level, up toward the remains of the skyscrapers. Behind him, one after another, the group tak into the wind, diving, rising with the wind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Map To The Stars Eddie makes a rapid suicidal dive right toward the pavement below. He screams like a madman until lifts him at the last possible second.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The group of hang gliders sweep past the buildings. A bra family is having dinner by candlelight two feet from the sheer precipice, as the side of the skyscraper they live been torn off. They wave to Plissken as he passes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two floors down, someone has hooked up huge speakers and croaking male voice is singing a Barbra Streisand hit to background track.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beautiful girl in a sheer diaphanous gown dances far ou narrow girder, waving a scarf at the moon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken and the others now fly in formation, like avengi through the night, except for Map To The Stars Eddie who rising and plunging violently, barely in control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An army of vehicles and people pour into Disneyland - but Disneyland gone to hell. A huge sign reads: "THE HAPPY KI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The gates no longer exist. The overhead tram lies broken ground. Slowly vehicles drive straight inside...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A battered old limousine carries Cuervo Jones and a grim- Utopia past the ruins of the train and around the ghost-t square of Main Street. Ahead is the fairy castle, broken crumbling, like some relic from a nightmare. Around it ar thrill rides, tossed in to a jumbled mass by the force of original earthquake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crowds are waiting. Gangs of every conceivable descriptio gangs. Female gangs. Gangs of children. Also families wit hangers-on. As soon as the limousine appears, the crowds cheering.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones stares out at the masses.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: They're simple people. They love a party. (turns to Utopia) We're gonna throw them one hell of a party when we get to America. Right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Utopia is silent, sullen. Cuervo raises his hand to her a jumps, cowering.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: Put a smile on your face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A terrified smile spreads across Utopia's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the limousine inches down Main Street, suddenly a wall headlights pop on. 100 or so battered old vintage Chevys engines, begin bouncing up and down wildly on hydraulic l Gangs begin cheering, firing their weapons into the air l Year's Eve.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the end of Main Street is a huge open area - almost an beyond which are parked a literal army of helicopters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the limousine stops, and Cuervo Jones emerges, Utopia arm, the cheering begins, a wall of sound through the par Black Muslims step out to greet Cuervo, dressed in turban headgear and sunglasses, wearing black capes and carrying Thompson machine guns. They stop, give the right-handed p salute. One of them, BIVOUAC, speaks to Cuervo.

dialogues.speaker: BIVOUAC
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones. Welcome, my Brother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones turns to the crowd, extends his arms.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: Are you ready for the New World?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the loudest, longest cheer you've ever heard goes up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken and the group sail through the sky like silent a angels toward Disneyland below them and several miles awa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Glances at his wrist watch. Only 20 minutes left. Map To Eddie swings wildly over in his direction, manages to sta his glider for a few moments.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Is that what I think it is?

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Yeah. The place kept changing owners. Finally went bankrupt. That thing in Paris killed 'em.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hershe and Spinal sweep over next to Plissken and fly in formation.

dialogues.speaker: HERSHE
dialogues.text: Snake. We need some kind of diversion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beat later all of them look over at Map To The Stars Ed

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones leads Utopia toward a large attack helicopte front of all the others. The choppers are all starting up roaring, blades turning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly shooting down out of the sky is a screaming, yel To The Stars Eddie diving out of control, eyes wide as he Cuervo Jones and Utopia.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Cuervo. Hey, man, I made it! I made it! Wait for me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Map To The Stars Eddie crash lands into the ruins of a fa restaurant - KACRUNCH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beat or so later he staggers out of the rig, dizzy and

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Hey Cuervo...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones turns to Bivouac.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: Would you please kill him for me?

dialogues.speaker: BIVOUAC
dialogues.text: My pleasure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bivouac raises his machine gun...

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Cuervo, wait! I got news. There's about to be an attack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo holds up his hand, stopping Bivouac. Everyone tens To The Stars Eddie races over...

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: You're about to get hit, Cuervo. It's Plissken.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: You told me he was dead.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: I thought he was, but he came back.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: Where?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Map To The Stars Eddie moves close to Cuervo, out of brea looking like he may faint...

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Oh Cuervo...

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: (long beat) What?

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: (stalling) It's so good to see you again.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: Where's Plissken?

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: He's... near.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: You're stalling, Eddie. (grabs him) Talk, you little gringo!

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: (eyes wide) Cuervo, look out behind you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Map To The Stars Eddie suddenly grabs Cuervo as if to pro and manages to wrap himself around the prototype in Cuerv At the same moment Bivouac and the Black Muslim open fire old storefront behind Cuervo Jones. The place is shredded

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones pulls Map To The Stars Eddie up off the grou grabs what looks like the prototype out of his clutches.

dialogues.speaker: CUERVO JONES
dialogues.text: You've lied to me for the very last time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones pulls out a pistol, cocks it, aims at Map To Stars Eddie's face...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KABLOOM! No, not the pistol. A huge explosion rocks Main

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHOOSH! Suddenly out of the night sky Spinal and the Blac dive right down across Main Street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KABLAM! Another explosion sends everyone scurrying for co

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spinal pulls the pin on a grenade, throws it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLAMM! BLOOM! Explosions erupt everywhere!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones grabs Utopia, turns to run toward to the lea helicopter when...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken roars down out of the sky and his him full force Plissken and the hang glider go tumbling and crashing in

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chaos and pandemonium. Hershe dives down over the gangs, hellfire from his automatic rifle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People running. Explosions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Map To The Stars Eddie grabs Utopia.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken and Cuervo Jones get to their feet and have at i

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Through flames and running people Plissken and Cuervo bat

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In Cuervo's hand is a long black knife. Just as he's plun Plissken steps aside and grabs him. Locked together, they savagely.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The knife cuts Plissken's chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo moves for Plissken's throat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken smashes him in the face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They both grip the knife in a deadlock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From above, Spinal dives down and hurls a grenade. Cuervo Plissken disappear in a huge flash of fire and smoke as t grenade erupts out of the pavement nearby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When the smoke clears, three things are on the ground. Pl Cuervo Jones. The prototype.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Instantly Plissken and Cuervo dive for the prototype. Pli it, kicks Cuervo in the face, drags himself to his feet a off running (as fast as a man can run with one bullet in

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Map To The Stars Eddie drags Utopia toward the lead helic Hershe comes in for a landing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spinal comes in for a landing, continues to throw grenade other Black Cowboys land, provide covering fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken races for the chopper. Behind him, Cuervo Jones feet and in pursuit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hershe opens fire at Cuervo. Cuervo dives behind a smokin burning Chevy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As everyone scrambles in. A Black Cowboy is hit by gunfir down the bulkhead and out the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken jumps in the left seat, takes the controls. Utop Map To The Stars Eddie both climb in the right seat toget others are in the back, firing back at the gangs. Plisske in power.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The needle's at 100% plus. Full power.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lead chopper shudders, trying to get off the ground. continues.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship shakes violently.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: She's overloaded! We're too heavy.

dialogues.speaker: HERSHE
dialogues.text: (screams from the rear compartment) Somebody get off!

dialogues.speaker: SPINAL
dialogues.text: (glares at him) Who?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All eyes quickly move to Map To The Stars Eddie...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bullets rip through the windscreen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is moving, through the smoke, charging the ship!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship trembles. Plissken moves his feet, jams in the l rotor pedal all the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rotates, turns around 180 degrees on the ground, pushed b tail rotor force.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Plissken inches it forward...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Begins sliding across the ground, skids grinding along th pavement, sparks flying - slowly at first, now picking up

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the cockpit, the ship lurches and jumps and slams! Eve bounced around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The helicopter moves fast now - faster -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they rise up, an inch off the ground - then two inches foot -
