dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones emerges from the smoke, running ahead of the gangs, barreling toward the ever-so-slowly rising chopper

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As it lifts - five feet - climbing...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The helicopter pulls away from the charging gangs and Cue sprinting figure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See the Matterhorn ahead, coming closer and closer. Hersh out the door.

dialogues.speaker: HERSHE
dialogues.text: We're not gonna make it over the fuckin' mountain!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The helicopter moves right toward the edge of the Matterh feet... 10... Plissken tries to maneuver out of the way.. feet... 5...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The helicopter wobbles over the top of the mountain, the skid catching on the Matterhorn's edge! A horrible cracki and the right skid is ripped off from its front mounting, half off the ship!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the ground, Cuervo Jones jumps into one of the waiting helicopters as now the gangs race into ships and begin li into the sky. Finally Cuervo's chopper lifts off...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An alarm horn sounds. Everyone is on the move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A crowd surrounds a computer screen with a small green bl over a grid of L.A.

dialogues.speaker: COM OFFICER
dialogues.text: Aircraft leaving the island, sir. It's passed into restricted space, heading this way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Malloy, the President, and Brazen exchange glances.

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: Is it Plissken?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nobody knows.

dialogues.speaker: COM OFFICER
dialogues.text: Commander, I'm getting radio contact with the aircraft.

dialogues.speaker: MALLOY
dialogues.text: Boost it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The COM Officer flips a switch, and we hear Plissken's vo booming through HQ.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Get ready, shitheads. We're comin' in.

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: Thank God.

dialogues.speaker: MALLOY
dialogues.text: (grabs a radio mike) Plissken - this is Malloy. Do you have the prototype?

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: (into his radio) Yeah, I got it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken glances at the transistor radio in his hand, sho his boot, reaches his hand out to Map To The Stars Eddie.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKE
dialogues.text: (to Map To The Stars Eddie) Now give me the real one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Utopia stares into Plissken's eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Map To The Stars Eddie shrugs innocently

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: I couldn't make the switch, Snake. I don't have it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly Utopia reaches into Map To The Stars Eddie's coa pulls out the real prototype. She hands it to Plissken

dialogues.speaker: UTOPIA
dialogues.text: Now we're even, Snake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Map To The Stars Eddie makes a lunge for it, but Plissken him in the face. His head bobs slowly back and forth for then he slumps in the seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Malloy set up in the staging area for landing.

dialogues.speaker: COM OFFICER
dialogues.text: Commander Malloy - he's got lots of company.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Malloy and the others look at the computer screen. Plissk green blip is followed by hundreds of other green blips a rapidly closing in on him...

dialogues.speaker: MALLOY
dialogues.text: Battle stations...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The room springs into action...

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: I think we've burned off enough fuel. We may be lighter enough to hover. Just barely.

dialogues.speaker: HERSHE
dialogues.text: Can you land?

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: No. The right skid's broken. If I try to set it down she'll crash. I have to stay in a hoverwhile you jump off. (beat as Plissken looks at Utopia) Hey, Carjack. We gotta hide the girl. Give her your dress.

dialogues.speaker: HERSHE
dialogues.text: (ice cold) My name is no longer Carjack. Will you please get that through your fucking head?

dialogues.speaker: SPINAL
dialogues.text: Holy shit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look, as suddenly the night sky on either side of th filled with gang helicopters!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lead helicopter is surrounded by enemy choppers. Abov on either side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right next to Plissken, Cuervo's chopper pulls up just te away. Cuervo grins out at Plissken evilly, unhooks himsel his seat...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the other side, another chopper with Bivouac and the B Muslims pull up. In the rear compartment, a Black Muslim looks like a huge harpoon gun mounted to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The line shoots out and a gleaming grappling hook slams i side of Plissken's chopper, the prongs clawing in, holdin lead helicopter, the Black Cowboys, Spinal and Hershe aim weapons.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Don't shoot! They can drag us down into the sea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo Jones leaps from the opened door of his chopper, f through space, lands on Plissken's door with a WHUMP! He through the side window and grabs Plissken.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KABLAM! KABLAM! Gang choppers open fire, riddling the rea compartment with bullets. Spinal and several Black Cowboy hit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken fights Cuervo through the door.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: (to Utopia) Take the controls!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Utopia stares at him.

dialogues.speaker: UTOPIA
dialogues.text: What do I do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Cuervo wrenches the door open, grabs Plissken, and pu out of the seat. Utopia grabs the controls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lead helicopter goes wild, lurching and swinging and Plissken and Cuervo are locked in a death grip, hanging o doorway, one foot in, one foot out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken embraces Cuervo and throws them both over the ed

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They fall through space, locked together, until...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHAP! They are jolted to a dead stop, swinging in mid-air Plissken's arm wrapped around the dangling right skid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lead helicopter bucks and spins and swings, Plissken Cuervo suspended below, struggling to the death, whipped forth by the helicopter's gyrations.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the cockpit, Utopia grabs the controls. The ship is sh swinging like a pendulum. Hershe is hit with gunfire, flo rear compartment. Map To The Stars Eddie slowly regains consciousness, stares in horror at Utopia.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Where's Plissken?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Outside, Cuervo clutches Plissken around the neck, strugg thrashing. Plissken head butts him, dazing him for a seco

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KA-CRACK! The dangling skid is breaking loose from its mo the helicopter above. Plissken and Cuervo Jones stare up, each other, then both begin pulling themselves up the ski climbing hand over hand, in a desperate race...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Both men reach the bottom of the helicopter and leap acro left skid as the dangling right skid breaks off and falls San Fernando Sea. Plissken and Cuervo kick at each other. slides away from him, looks up... sees the grappling hook into the side of the helicopter...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken swings up, straddling the skid. He reaches up an prying loose the grappling hook. Cuervo's coming right up him, reaching for him, a huge knife in his hands. He rais knife - when Map To The Stars Eddie leans out of the cock lowers a gun and aims it right at Cuervo.

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: Hey, Cuervo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cuervo looks at him, starts to say something, eyes bulgin

dialogues.speaker: MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE
dialogues.text: If you get to America - let's do lunch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KABLAM! KABLAM! The shots hit, and Cuervo buckles, falls off the skid, plunging downward toward the surface of the Fernando Sea... KASPLASH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken rips out the grappling hook...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Map To The Stars Eddie is hit with gunfire, dies, falls o seat, out of the door, out of the helicopter - plunges to water below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken jumps back inside the cockpit.

dialogues.speaker: UTOPIA
dialogues.text: Snake, look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Police battle helicopters thunder toward them. In unison, police helicopters launch their missiles from gun platfor Burning, white-sulfurous napalm shells streak across the and hit enemy choppers. The sky around the lead helicopte filled with explosions, waves of rolling fire, falling fl wrecks plunging past, as enemy choppers begin to hit the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is a dreamlike, slow-motion ballet. Huge black police circle lazily around the enemy choppers, their flex-guns rockets spitting blue-white fire. The pound the living he the enemy choppers. In f.g. Plissken's helicopter sweeps wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Malloy, the President, Brazen and the rest the Firebase w Plissken's helicopter approaches, then zooms right over R and heads for the distant treeline.

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: Where the hell is he going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken's helicopter comes in, lower and lower, into a h feet above the ground. Inside, Plissken pulls in all the he's got.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: It's taking all the power we've got to hover.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shows 100% plus power. The helicopter is in a trembling h Inside...

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Jump out. Head for the treeline and disappear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Utopia stares at him.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Utopia jumps out of the helicopter... lands on the ground takes off running into the darkness. Inside...

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: All right, baby. Don't be too rough on me. We're gonna land.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken slowly drops the collective control. The left sk down, and the ship continues to descend, tips, begins to Inside, as the chopper rolls over, Plissken braces himsel blades hit the ground, the chopper goes wild. The fuselag and twists in a grinding fury. Smoke and debris fly. The snap off...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looking out the front, the blades smash through the winds barely missing the top of Plissken's head. Plissken is sp with glass, a piece of metal debris protrudes from the fl of his biceps. Blood pours. The rear compartment explodes flames as the engine grinds into the gas tank. Fire billo the cockpit, engulfing Plissken...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Outside, Plissken pulls himself out of the door. He is on Dives away from the copper and rolls across the ground ju flaming mid-section of the ship explodes in a roaring fir

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken climbs to his feet, smoking, wounded...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... as Malloy, the President, Brazen, and a squad of poli in vehicles. They slowly get out...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... as Plissken limps toward them...

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Where's the anti-toxin...?

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: Give me the prototype.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken reaches into his boot, hands it to the President

dialogues.speaker: MALLOY
dialogues.text: Hold it, Plissken. Now give us the real one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken reaches down into his other boot, comes out with The Stars Eddie's transistor radio. The President hurls t prototype away, walks to Plissken and grabs the phony. Pl glances at it lying on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nobody moves. Plissken looks at their faces.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Give me the goddamn shot!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly everyone begins to smirk. A couple cops laugh.

dialogues.speaker: MALLOY
dialogues.text: It was all a fake, Plissken.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken stares at him. More laughter.

dialogues.speaker: BRAZEN
dialogues.text: You were injected with glucose. There is no Plutoxin 7 virus. You were never going to die - at least not from anything we gave you.

dialogues.speaker: MALLOY
dialogues.text: C'mon, Snake - it's L.A. Everything's phony, you know that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken moves toward the President, stops inches away.

dialogues.speaker: MALLOY
dialogues.text: Relax, war hero. We took you for a ride, and you came through. Not bad for a dirtbag like you.

dialogues.speaker: PRESIDENT
dialogues.text: You're free, Plissken. But if you even so much as break wind on a country road I'll crush you like a bug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The President glares at Plissken, turns, walks away.

dialogues.speaker: COP, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Commander... (Malloy looks at him) Look what we found.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Across the clearing come two policemen dragging Utopia al them. They bring her up in front of Malloy. Utopia glance Plissken.

dialogues.speaker: MALLOY
dialogues.text: You didn't finish the mission, Plissken. We'll have to do that for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken, Malloy and Brazen watch as Utopia is taken away Plissken turns to Malloy.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: Got a smoke?

dialogues.speaker: MALLOY
dialogues.text: You're gonna have to learn to respect the law, Snake. The United States is a no- smoking nation. No smoking, no drinking, do drugs, no women unless you're married, no guns, no foul language. It's a brand new day for you, Snake.

dialogues.speaker: PLISSKEN
dialogues.text: The name's Plissken.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken walks away. Follow his feet as they stop next to prototype lying in the grass...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Utopia is being strapped into an electric chair by her po guards. The guards step back from Utopia. One of them wal to a huge switch on the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He holds the real prototype, calmly pushes the button.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ring of space satellites hover silently above the Ear the United States, North America below, as a beautiful su beginning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly the satellites explode into white...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the sky is lit white. Malloy, Brazen, and the cops loo vehicles stop. Lights out. Sounds of motors running down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Darkness. No power. Everyone looks around. Utopia smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The daylight is coming as police helicopters fall from th crashing. Panic. Policemen run everywhere. A duty sergean up to Malloy...

dialogues.speaker: DUTY SERGEANT
dialogues.text: We're being attacked, Commander. The north wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All of L.A. has arrive at the wall in boats. Gangs lean l use ropes and hooks - they scale the wall. Pendejo Bob le charge. Pipeline is right behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gunfire. A pitched battle as cops try to repel the horde invaders as they pour over the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Firebase is overrun by invaders. Hand-to-hand combat. War III has begun. Panicked cops race for the trees, aban their positions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Third World warriors free Utopia from the electric ch joins them as they swarm through the halls...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plissken is at the edge of the Firebase, moving out into hillside. Camera tracks with him towards the rising sun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A smile crosses Plissken's face. He tosses the prototype ravine, and walks away into the sunrise.
